- As a bonus action, ranged kensei weapon attacks deal +1d4 damage in current turn

atkAdd: var monkDie:function(n) {return n < 5 ? 4 : n < 11 ? 6 : n < 17 ? 8 : 10;}; if (classes.known.monk && classes.known.monk.level > 2 && theWea && !isSpell && !theWea.monkweapon && (!(/heavy|special/i).test(fields.Description) || WeaponName === 'longbow') && WeaponText.toLowerCase().indexOf('kensei') !== -1) {var aMonkDie:aMonkDie ? aMonkDie : monkDie(classes.known.monk.level); try {var curDie:eval(fields.Damage_Die.replace('d', '*'));} catch (e) {var curDie:'x';}; if (isNaN(curDie) || curDie < aMonkDie) {fields.Damage_Die:'1d' + aMonkDie; }; if (theWea.ability === 1) {fields.Mod:StrDex; }; if (isRangedWeapon) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'As bonus action with Attack action, +1d4 damage'; }; fields.Proficiency:true; };

If I inlcude the word 'Kensei' in the name of a weapon that doesn't have the Heavy or Special attribute, or that is a longbow, that weapon gains the same benefits as any other 'Monk Weapon'.
In addition, with ranged 'Kensei Weapons', I can take a bonus action to have that hit, and any other hit after that as part of the same action, do +1d4 damage.

ki-empowered strikes.name: One with the Blade
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes and kensei weapon attacks count as magical

atkAdd: if (((/unarmed strike/i).test(WeaponName) || (WeaponText.toLowerCase().indexOf('kensei') !== -1  && theWea && !isSpell && (!(/heavy|special/i).test(fields.Description) || WeaponName === 'longbow'))) && fields.Description.indexOf('Counts as magical') === -1 && !thisWeapon[1]) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Counts as magical';};
My unarmed strikes and any Kensei Weapons count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

precise strike.name: Precise Strike
precise strike.description: Once per turn when I hit with a kensei weapon, I can do a martial arts die extra damage

subclassfeature17.name: Unerring Accuracy
subclassfeature17.description: Once per turn, if I miss a monk weapon attack on my turn, I can reroll the attack roll

sharpen the blade.name: Sharpen the Blade
description: As a bonus action, I can grant my kensei weapon a bonus to attack and damage rolls
This bonus is equal to the number of ki points I spend; It lasts for 1 minute

subclassfeature17.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 11 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('sharpen the blade') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature17', 'sharpen the blade', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk <= 11 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 11) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature17', 'sharpen the blade', 'extra'], 'remove')}

subclassfeature1.name: Divine Magic
description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list
These cleric spells count as sorcerer spells for me
I also learn Cure Wounds, which doesn't count against my number of spells known

subclassfeature1.2.name: Favored by the Gods
subclassfeature1.2.description: If I fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, I can add 2d4 to the total

subclassfeature6.name: Empowered Healing
description: When I roll dice for healing with one of my sorcerer spells, I can reroll them once
By spending 1 sorcery point, I can reroll any number of those dice for that spell

subclassfeature14.name: Angelic Form
description: Choose an otherworldly quality using the "Choose Feature" button above
As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

beautiful.name: Angelic Form: Beautiful
description: My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of beauty
As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

youthful.name: Angelic Form: Youthful
description: My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of youthfulness
As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

kind.name: Angelic Form: Kind
description: My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of kindness
As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

imposing.name: Angelic Form: Imposing
description: My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of imposingness
As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Unearthly Recovery
description: As a bonus action when I have less than half of my max HP remaining, I can heal myself
I regain a number of HP equal to half my hit point maximum

subclassfeature2.name: Speech of the Woods
description: I can talk with beasts, they understand me and I them, to the limit of their intelligence
This doesn't automatically make me friends with all beasts; Additionally, I learn Sylvan

subclassfeature2.1.name: Spirit Totem
description: As a bonus action, I can summon, or move, a spirit to a point I can see within 60 ft
The spirit is a Bear, Hawk, or Unicorn (see below), which has a 30-ft radius aura
It is incorporeal, immobile, doesn't counts as a creature or object, and persists for 1 min
Bear: my allies in the area and I instantly gain 5 + my druid level in temp HP
While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Strength checks and saves
Hawk: As a reaction, I can grant advantage on an attack vs. a target in the aura
Unicorn: my allies and I gain advantage on ability checks to detect targets in the aura
If I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, allies in the aura heal my druid level in HP

subclassfeature6.name: Mighty Summoner
subclassfeature6.description: Beasts or Fey I summon with spells get +2 HP per HD and their attacks count as magical

subclassfeature10.name: Guardian Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: When a Beast or Fey that I summoned ends its turn in my Spirit Totem aura, it heals

subclassfeature14.name: Faithful Summons
description: When I am reduced to 0 HP or incapacitated against my will, I can summon protectors
I gain the benefits of a Conjure Animals spell as if cast with a 9th-level spell slot
It summons 4 beast of my choice with CR 2 or lower within 20 ft of me for 1 hour
If they receive no commands from me, they protect me from harm and attack my foes

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiency
description: I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
Alternatively, I learn one language of my choice
choices: Skill proficiency: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Bonus Proficiency
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.name: Bonus Proficiency
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.description: I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.skillstxt: : Choose one from: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Born in the Saddle
description: I have advantage on saves to avoid falling off my mount, and land on my feet if I fail
Mounting or dismounting a creature costs me only 5 ft of movement instead of half

subclassfeature3.2.name: Combat Superiority
description: I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special maneuvers (see below)
I can use only one maneuver per attack; I regain all superiority dice after a short rest
• Control Mount (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3)
Use after rolling Wis (Animal Handling) to influence an animal I or an ally is riding
I add the superiority die to the result
• Precision Attack (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3)
Use after rolling to hit; I add the superiority die to my attack roll
• Trip Attack (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3) [DC 8 + Prof Bonus + Str mod]
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be knocked prone
• Warding Maneuver (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3) [only while wielding weapon or shield]
As a reaction when I or a creature within 5 ft is hit, I add the superiority die to AC
If the attack still hits, the target counts as having resistance against the attack

subclassfeature7.name: Ferocious Charger
description: I can use two superiority dice, instead of just one, when using the Trip Attack Maneuver
If doing so, both dice are added to the damage and the target has disadv. on its Str save

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Presence
description: As an action, all creatures of my choice within 30-ft radius must make a Wisdom save
If failed, a target is frightened for 1 minute; It can save again at the end of each turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I make an attack roll, I can add a +10 bonus to the roll after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Conquest
description: Enemies that are frightened of me have their speed reduced to 0 while in my aura
They also take psychic damage whenever they start theirs turn within my aura

subclassfeature15.name: Scornful Rebuke
description: Whenever I'm hit with an attack while I'm not incapacitated, the attacker takes damage
This is psychic damage equal to my Charisma modifier (minimum of 0)

subclassfeature20.name: Invincible Conqueror
description: As an action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
- I have resistance to all damage
- I can make an additional attack as part of my Attack action
- My melee weapons score critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrips
subclassfeature1.description: I know the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips

subclassfeature1.1.name: Healing Light
description: As a bonus action, I can heal a creature on touch by expending dice from my pool
I can expend up to my Charisma modifier (min 1) of dice at a time
The target heals HP equal to the roll of the dice; I regain all expended dice on a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Radiant Soul
description: I add my Cha modifier to cantrips/spells I cast that deal fire or radiant damage
Additionally, I have resistance to radiant damage

atkCalc: if (isSpell && (/fire|radiant/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spells that deal fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to the damage.

subclassfeature10.name: Radiant Resilience
description: When I finish a short or long rest, I and up to five allies gain temporary hit points
I get my warlock level + Cha mod, while my allies get half my warlock level + Cha mod

subclassfeature14.name: Searing Vengeance
description: At the start of my turn when I would make a death save, I can instead spring back up
I can stand up and recover HP equal to half my current HP maximum
Also, creatures of my choice within 30 ft of me take 2d8 + Cha mod in radiant damage
Damaged creatures are blinded until the end of my current turn

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Aspect of the Moon (prereq: Pact of the Tome)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Aspect of the Moon
ClassList.mystic.description: I don't need sleep nor can be forced to by any means; I can rest while doing light activity
ClassList.mystic.prereqeval: What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the tome') !== -1

text: Nothing can force me to sleep

ClassList.mystic.name: Cloak of Flies
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: As a bonus action, I can surround myself with a 5-ft radius magical aura of buzzing flies
It lasts until I'm incapacitated or dismiss it as a bonus action; Total cover block the aura
The aura grants me adv. on Cha (Intimidation), but disadv. on all other Cha checks
Creatures starting their turn in the aura take my Cha mod (min 0) in poison damage

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Eldritch Smite (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Blade)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Eldritch Smite
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: Once per turn when I hit a creature with my pact weapon, I can do extra damage
By expending a warlock spell slot, the creature takes extra damage and is knocked prone
It takes 1d8 force damage and another 1d8 force damage per level of the spell slot
If the target takes any of this bonus damage, it is knocked prone if it is Huge or smaller
ClassList.mystic.prereqeval: classes.known.warlock.level >= 5 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the blade') !== -1

ClassList.mystic.name: Frost Lance
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: Once per turn when my Eldritch Blast hits a creature, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft
This speed reduction lasts until the end of my next turn

atkAdd: if (theWea && (/eldritch blast/i).test(theWea.name)) {fields.Description += '; 1 target -10 ft speed'; };
When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip once or more times in a turn, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft until the end of my next turn.

ClassList.mystic.name: Ghostly Gaze
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: As an action, I can see through solid objects out to 30 ft, until the end of my current turn
Objects appear ghostly to me; I also gain 30 ft darkvision for the duration

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Gift of the Depths (prereq: level 5 warlock)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Gift of the Depths
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: I can breathe underwater and I have a swim speed equal to my walking speed
Once per long rest, I can cast Water Breathing without using a spell slot (PHB 287)

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Gift of the Ever-Living Ones (prereq: Pact of the Chain)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
ClassList.mystic.description: When I regain HP while my familiar is within 100 ft, I regain the max the dice can roll
ClassList.mystic.prereqeval: What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the chain') !== -1

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Grasp of Hadar (prereq: Eldritch Blast cantrip)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Grasp of Hadar
ClassList.mystic.description: When my Eldritch Blast hits a creature once or more, I can move it 10 ft closer to me

atkAdd: if (theWea && (/eldritch blast/i).test(theWea.name)) {fields.Description += '; Target moved 10 ft to me'; };
When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip once or more times in a turn, I can move it in a straight line 10 ft closer to me.

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Improved Pact Weapon (prereq: Pact of the Blade)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Improved Pact Weapon
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: I can use any pact weapon I create as my spellcasting focus for warlock spells
Any pact weapon I create has a +1 magic weapon, if it isn't already a magic weapon
ClassList.mystic.prereqeval: What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the blade') !== -1

atkCalc: if (!thisWeapon[1] && (/\bpact\b/i).test(WeaponText)) { var pactMag:pactMag !== undefined ? 1 - pactMag : 1; output.magic += pactMag; };

If I include the word 'Pact' in a weapon's name or description, it will be treated as a Pact Weapon. If it doesn't already include a magical bonus in its name, the calculation will add +1 to its To Hit and Damage.

ClassList.mystic: AddWarlockInvocation("Kiss of Mephistopheles (prereq: level 5 warlock, Eldritch Blast cantrip)"

ClassList.mystic.name: Kiss of Mephistopheles
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: As a bonus action when my Eldritch Blast hits, I can cast Fireball using a warlock spell slot
The origin of the Fireball is the creature that was hit with my Eldritch Blast attack

ClassList.mystic.name: Maddening Hex
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: As a bonus action, I cause pain around a target affected by a hex of mine (spell/feature)
It and any of my choice within 5 ft of it take my Cha mod (min 0) in psychic damage

ClassList.mystic.name: Relentless Hex
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: As a bonus action, I can teleport next to a target affected by a hex of mine (spell/feature)
To do so, I must see the target and the space I'm teleporting to, and be within 30 ft of it

ClassList.mystic.name: Shroud of Shadow
ClassList.mystic.description: I can cast Invisibility at will, without using spell slots (PHB 254)

ClassList.mystic.name: Tomb of Levistus
ClassList.mystic.description: desc(
description: As a reaction when I take damage, I can entomb myself in ice until the end of my turn
During, I get 10 temp. HP per warlock level, which I use to absorb the triggering damage
After, till the ice is gone, I also get vulnerability to fire, 0 speed, and am incapacitated

ClassList.mystic.name: Trickster's Escape
ClassList.mystic.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Freedom of Movement on myself without using a spell slot

ClassList.mystic.name: Eladrin

text: Magic can't put me to sleep

ClassList.mystic.age: typically claim adulthood around age 100 and can live to be 750 years old
ClassList.mystic.height: range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall (4'6" + 2d12")
ClassList.mystic.heightMetric: range from under 1,5 to over 1,8 metres tall (140 + 5d12 cm)
ClassList.mystic.trait:
Eladrin (+2 Dexterity, +1 Intelligence or Charisma)
Trance: Elves don't need to sleep, but meditate semiconsciously, for 4 hours a day. This gives the same benefit as a human gets from 8 hours of sleep (long rest only 4 hours).
Fey Step: Once per short rest, as a bonus action, I can magically teleport up to 30 ft to an unoccupied space I can see.
ClassList.mystic.\n: Shifting Seasons: After a short or long rest, I can align myself with a season, granting me acces to a cantrip until my next rest: Friends, Chill Touch, Minor Illusion, or Fire Bolt. My spellcasting ability for this is Int or Cha, whichever is higher.

ClassList.mystic.name: Avariel

text: Magic can't put me to sleep

ClassList.mystic.age: typically claim adulthood around age 100 and can live to be 750 years old

ClassList.mystic.heightMetric: range from 1,5 to over 1,8 metres tall (145 + 5d10 cm)
ClassList.mystic.trait:
Avariel (+2 Dexterity)
Trance: Elves don't need to sleep, but meditate semiconsciously, for 4 hours a day. While meditating, I can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, I gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep, thus needing only 4 hours for a long rest.
Flight: I have a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, I can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

subclassfeature2.name: Circle Spells
description: My link to the cycle of life and death gives me with the ability to cast certain spells
These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare
In addition, I learn the Chill Touch cantrip

subclassfeature2.1.name: Halo of Spores
subclassfeature2.1.description: As a reaction on my turn, I can do poison damage to one creature I can see within 10 ft

subclassfeature2.2.name: Symbiotic Entity
description: As an action, I expend a Wild Shape use to boost my spores instead of transforming
I then gain 3 temporary HP per druid level and my Halo of Spores does double damage
Also, my melee weapon attacks do +1d6 poison damage with every hit
This lasts for 10 minutes or until I use Wild Shape again

atkAdd: if (isMeleeWeapon && (/\b(spore|symbiotic)\b/i).test(WeaponText) && !isNaturalWeapon) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + '+1d6 poison damage';};

If I include the word 'Spore' or 'Symbiotic' in a melee weapon's name or description, it gets treated as a weapon that is infused by my Symbiotic Entity feature, adding +1d6 poison damage in the description.

subclassfeature6.name: Fungal Infestation
description: If I kill a humanoid with my Halo of Spores, it rises as a zombie at the end of my turn
This zombie has 1 HP, only takes the Attack action, and can only make 1 attack with it
It follows my mental commands and takes it turn after mine; It lasts for 1 hour

subclassfeature10.name: Spreading Spores
description: As a bonus action, I create a 10-ft cube of fungal spores within 30 ft, lasting for 1 min
Any creature starting its turn in the cube takes the damage of my Halo of Spores
The cube ends if I use this again; While the cube persists, I can't use my Halo of Spores

subclassfeature14.name: Fungal Body
subclassfeature14.description: I'm immune to critical hits and to being blinded, deafened, frightened, and poisoned

subclassfeature3.name: Brute Force
subclassfeature3.description: I do additional damage with weapons that I'm proficient with

atkAdd: if (classes.known.fighter && classes.known.fighter.level > 2 && !isSpell && !isNaturalWeapon && fields.Proficiency) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + '+1d' + (classes.known.fighter.level < 10 ? 4 : classes.known.fighter.level < 16 ? 6 : classes.known.fighter.level < 20 ? 8 : 10) + ' damage'};
I do +1d4 damage with weapons that I'm proficient with. This increases to 1d6 at 10th level, 1d8 at 16th level, and 1d10 at 20th level.

subclassfeature7.name: Brutish Durability
description: I add +1d6 to all my saving throws, including death saves
If the total of a death save is 20 or more, it counts as rolling a 20

subclassfeature10.FSfea.name: "Additional Fighting Style";
FSfea.source
FSfea.name: UA:TS
subclassfeature10.FSfea.minlevel: "Choose an Additional Fighting Style using the \"Choose Feature\" button above ";

subclassfeature15.name: Devastating Critical
subclassfeature15.description: Whenever I score a critical hit with a weapon, I add my fighter level to the damage

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
description: If I have less than half my max HP at the start of my turn, I heal myself
I regain HP equal to 5 + Constitution modifier (min 1); This doesn't work if I'm at 0 HP

subclassfeature2.name: Tools of the Inventor
subclassfeature2.description: I gain proficiency with light armor and two tools of my choice

subclassfeature2.1.name: Arcanomechanical Armor
description: After a long rest, I can transform a studded leather armor into arcanomechanical armor
This is a magic light armor that gives AC 12 + Dex mod and force resistance, if attuned
Only I can attune to it; Creating a new one removes the magic from the previous

subclassfeature2.2.name: Reckless Casting
description: As an action, I can attempt to cast a random spell or cantrip by rolling a d10 on a table
On a roll of 10, I roll again twice on that table and cast both results
However, if I then roll 10 on either dice, the whole casting fails and the action is wasted
If I choose cantrip, I roll on the table once and cast the result
If I choose a spell, I expend a spell slot and roll twice on the table for the slot's level
I can then choose which of the results I use; Use 5th-level table for spell slots over level 5
subclassfeature2.2.castingTable:
◆ Reckless Casting Tables (School of Invention 2, UA:TS 3)
d10	Cantrip		d10	Cantrip
castingTable: 5	Poison Spray	  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted
5	False Life		  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted
5	Invisibility		  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted
5	Fly		  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted
5	Greater Invisibility	  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted
2	Cone of Cold	    7	Mass Cure Wounds
5	Hold Monster	  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted
subclassfeature2.2.eval: try {AddToNotes(ClassSubList['wizard-school of invention'].features['subclassfeature2.2'].castingTable, "School of Invention's Reckless Casting tables");} catch (er) {};

subclassfeature6.name: Alchemical Casting
description: I can manipulate spells cast while wearing and attuned to my Arcanomechanical Armor
By expending an additional 1st or 2nd-level spell slot, I do the following:
• 1st: I can substitute acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for another type
• 2nd: I increase the spells damage, if any, by 2d10 force damage against one target

subclassfeature10.name: Prodigious Inspiration
subclassfeature10.description: As a bonus action, I can replace a prepared spell with another from my spellbook

subclassfeature14.name: Controlled Chaos
description: When I expend a spell slot to cast a spell using Reckless Casting, it is more powerful
I can roll on the table that is one level higher than the spell slot expended
